--- Page 1 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2022/0067 b) Date of Occurrence: 02/09/2023
c) Installation Details: Osprey Guardian - AC-9352-870 at
Regional Depot-B
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Avionics b) Date Component 07/09/2023
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Navigation System d) Main Assembly: Pylon-B
e) Nomenclature: Navigation System Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: Standard
g) Part No.: AV-7968-L5 h) Sl No.: SN-3012-299
i) Firmware Version: FW-6.90.905 j) Software Version: SW-9.42.238
k) Date of Installation: 13/09/2020 l) Date of Removal: 04/09/2023
Pg No: 35 Ln No: 13 Pg No: 87 Ln No: 27
m) Manufacturing Agency: Zeta Systems Corp n) Date, Month & Year February 2017
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: No p) Whether under AMC No
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 2056 Hrs / 1812 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Sensor fusion algorithm anomaly. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 19/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type.
Date: 21/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations.
Date: 21/09/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur.
Date: 26/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions.
Date: 28/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
